text: This is a working list of notable faculty, alumni and scholars of the University of Pennsylvania in Philadelphia, United States. == Faculty == ==Alumni== ===Academia=== As is detailed below, Penn alumni are the (a) founders of eight medical schools including New York University Medical School and Vanderbilt University School of Medicine, and (b) current or past presidents of over one hundred (100) universities and colleges including Harvard University, University of Pennsylvania, Princeton University, Cornell University, University of California system, University of Texas system, Carnegie Mellon University, Northwestern University, Bowdoin College and Williams College. ====Founders and leaders of academic institutions==== ====Law Professors and Other Legal Academics==== *Khaled Abou El Fadl, professor of law at UCLA School of Law; scholar of Islamic law, immigration, human rights, international and national security law, clerked for Arizona Supreme Court Justice James Moeller, previously taught Islamic law at the University of Texas School of Law at Austin, Yale Law School and Princeton UniversityUCLA School of Law Faculty Profile: Professor Khaled Abou El Fadl *Azizah Y. al-Hibri, Professor of Law, Emerita, at T.C.
